Package com.example.Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.Controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class Controller extends Object implements ActionListener
Controller class for the Fauna menu.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ruymán Crespo Díaz, Silvia Oliva Rodríguez, José Ramón Navarro González
